Name: Puzzle Park
About the game: Welcome to the puzzle park! You will meet with a lot of puzzles scattered across the park. Solve them and get stars that will help you move forward. Choose your own path on which you will go, because the game is completely non-linear and with an open world. Choose the puzzles that you master and get rewards depending on the complexity of the puzzle. Also enjoy a walk in the park with beautiful views and sights. Involve the environment and use logic and imagination to solve the puzzle. 40 puzzles scattered around the park. Get a different number of stars for solving puzzles, depending on its difficulty. Use the stars to unlock new parts of the park. Simple puzzle mechanics, which are complicated by various variations and involving the environment. Beautiful unique places where you can enjoy the views and walk.
